    heading="Welcome to Kroger!"

## Error

```jsx
<GlobalMessage
    kind="error"
    heading="We are experiencing technical difficulties!"
>
    We are sorry.
    <br />
    <Link noRouter={true}>Learn more</Link>
</GlobalMessage>
```

## Warning

```jsx
<GlobalMessage
    kind="warning"
    heading="Spill in aisle seven!"
    onClose={() => alert('ðŸŽ‰ You closed it! ðŸŽŠ')}
>
    Watch your footing.
</GlobalMessage>
```
